evidence.claim: Moterum Technologies emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations in their data handling processes.
They have a focus on EHR interoperability, which often involves FHIR standards.
The company mentions integration with cloud services which aids in their healthcare solutions.
They reference handling various transaction sets common in the healthcare sector, including X12.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found for X12 use cases or API automation in healthcare.
